author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 17-year-old garment factory employee was allegedly raped by a 27-year-old man at Laggere.

Mineral water supplier

Based on the complaint lodged by the victim’s family on Friday, the police arrested Vasanth, a mineral water supplier, who lives next to the garment factory.

According to the police, the girl and Vasanth are friends.

On Thursday, she went to his office during the lunch hour. When she returned home in the evening, her uncle reportedly called up the garment factory and was told that she had left during lunch hour.

She claimed that she had been sexually assaulted by Vasanth.

The Rajagopal Nagar police have booked a case of rape and included several sections of Protection of Children from Sexual Offences (POCSO).

The girl and the suspect were taken for a medical examination.
title: Minor alleges sexual assault, police arrest suspect
